cells.data: Basic rule: you never ever can change a revision directly, you only can create new ones and change the pointer(s)

git reset --hard <commit-hash>
git push -f origin master
Whenever doing so, take into consideration that all changes from other people done in the meantime will be reset as well!
Revert a single file for to a specific version

git log -p path/to/file
# Find the commit hash
git checkout 856b4dedb077dbef8a26d90fcf54000132987afd path/to/file
git commit
